ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-14T03:25:15 [Issue ID 4000-305773] urn:comicvine:4000-305773 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-12 08:54:30. [Issue ID 900446]
ComicInfo.Summary:
Jennifer’s gory war against the Blutes is finished; now it's time for clean-up. Does everything wrap up nicely? Not so much. This issue provides some background on what a woman who kills six men during the week does to relax on a Sunday, How she handles the fact that the only witness to her mass murder has disappeared – and she had nothing to do with it. There’s also a gruesome side note about what happens when you short-change a powerful man with a rotten temper.
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-02-10 17:52:48. [CVDB305773]

ComicInfo.Title: 7: Yesterday, When I Was Mad
